verses.text: \w About|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Baptist \w first|strong="G3588"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3854"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="G2784"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*:

‘\w Repent|strong="G3340"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G3588"\w* \w hand|strong="G1448"\w*.’

\w John|strong="G3004"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w*, \w where|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* crying aloud \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*: ‘\w Make|strong="G4160"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w paths|strong="G5147"\w* \w straight|strong="G2117"\w*.’”

\w John|strong="G2491"\w*’\w s|strong="G2192"\w* \w clothes|strong="G1742"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* camels’ \w hair|strong="G2359"\w*, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w leather|strong="G1193"\w* strap \w round|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w waist|strong="G3751"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w food|strong="G5160"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* locusts \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wild|strong="G2532"\w* \w honey|strong="G3192"\w*.

\w At|strong="G4314"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G5119"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w district|strong="G4066"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1607"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* baptised \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w* \w River|strong="G4215"\w*, \w confessing|strong="G1843"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* sins.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G3004"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* receive \w his|strong="G1909"\w* baptism, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="G5210"\w* children \w of|strong="G2532"\w* snakes! \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* prompted \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w seek|strong="G5101"\w* refuge \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* judgment?
\w Let|strong="G3767"\w* \w your|strong="G4160"\w* life, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, prove \w your|strong="G4160"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* “Abraham \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w ancestor|strong="G3962"\w*,” \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* descendants \w for|strong="G1063"\w* Abraham!

\w Already|strong="G2235"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* axe \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w root|strong="G4491"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w tree|strong="G1186"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* fails \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bear|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w cut|strong="G1581"\w* \w down|strong="G1581"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thrown \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, baptise \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* teach \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w more|strong="G2532"\w* \w powerful|strong="G2478"\w* \w than|strong="G2478"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fit|strong="G2425"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* carry \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w sandals|strong="G5266"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* baptise \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w His|strong="G1519"\w* winnowing-fan \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w clear|strong="G1245"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* threshing-floor, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w store|strong="G4863"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w grain|strong="G4621"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* barn, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* chaff \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w burn|strong="G2618"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* cannot \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G3588"\w* baptised \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* tried \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w prevent|strong="G1254"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. ‘\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* baptised \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*,’ \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w so|strong="G2532"\w* why \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?’

\wj ‘\+w This|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w way|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w should|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w now|strong="G1161"\+w*,’\wj* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w because|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w we|strong="G2249"\+w* \+w should|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w do|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w everything|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w God|strong="G3004"\+w* requires.’\wj* \w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w John|strong="G3004"\w* agreed.

\w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* baptism \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w just|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* opened, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w dove|strong="G4058"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* resting \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* dearly loved \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w brings|strong="G1510"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w great|strong="G2532"\w* joy.’
